section.section: Except as otherwise provided in this subsection, this title does not limit the right of an individual to practice a health occupation that the individual is authorized to practice under this article.
The provisions of this title do not affect a physician while practicing medicine, unless the physician practices dentistry as a specialty.

text.section: This title does not prohibit an educational program broadcast on radio or television by the Department or by the health department of a political subdivision of this State.

This title does not apply to a clinic maintained by a public school, a State institution, or charitable institution, or a business corporation, for its pupils, inmates, or employees if:
The school or institution, or corporation does not advertise concerning dentistry; and
Notwithstanding the provisions of this subsection:
Each dental hygienist, dental assistant, dental technician, or other dental auxiliary employed by the clinic shall be subject to the provisions of this title; and
Each dentist employed by the clinic shall be licensed and shall be subject to the provisions of Subtitle 3 of this title.
